room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: We did the Shattered Kingdom Room. It was so much fun. We almost made it out. We will definitely return to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: I did the Shattered Kingdom with my 22-year-old son and had a BLAST! We were paired with another father-son duo. We started off a little slow as it was all of our first time but once we got rolling it was intense with the clock ticking. I would highly recommend Locked In Escapes. We can't wait to go back and try a different room!!

room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: We booked the Shattered Kingdom room and are so glad that we did. This was our first time at Locked in Escapes and we had a great time. Only had 29 seconds left but we made it! It was a very fun and challenging room. Highly recommend it. Thanks for the fun Locked in Escapes! We will be back to do more of the rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: Went with family, and it was a blast!We were really blown away by the props and imagination in Shattered Kingdom.The staff was fantastic and welcoming, the system of communication was intuitive, and all in all it was a great experience.

room_title: Escape room "Shattered Kingdom" by Locked In Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: Locked In Escapes is by far my favorite escape room place that I've visited! The Shattered Kingdom was fun with a good amount of difficulty, we finished with 22 seconds left! Definitely recommend and we will be back to do the other rooms!
